#labels Phase-Design,AdminUI
=Choose A Currency=

==Available Settings for Site Payment Settings==
Please set the following information about how payments are handled for your site.

    * Currency:
      Please choose a currency for your site.
      Admin can choose currency from a list of all modern currencies.  This allows you to define the way your pricing is displayed, including the correct currency symbol. 


==Future Possibilities==
Payment options: Specify multiple options available to site users (paypal, google, cash/check, credit card via phone, pay later...).
